label: 帰化人
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: “one who has been civilized” by emigrating to the realm of an enlightened monarch and becoming a subject of that monarch (i.e. the tennô). This term was used by the Japanese court in referring to immigrants from the Korean peninsula and other regions on the continent. [天皇]
